import React from 'react' import { Modal, ModalBody, ModalFooter, ModalHeader, Button } from 'reactstrap' import apiconfig from './../../../../configs/api.config.json' import axios from 'axios' import API from '../../../../helpers/API' // import DeleteModal from './DeleteModal' export default class CreateDesignReq extends React.Component { constructor(props){ super(props) let date = new Date() let hari = date.getDate() let bulan = date.getMonth() + 1 let tahun = date.getFullYear() if (bulan < 10) { bulan = '0' + bulan } let userdata = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem(apiconfig.LS.USERDATA)) let role_id = userdata.m_role_id this.state = { role_id: role_id, design_item: [], staff: [], event: [], formdata_design: { code: '', t_event_id: '', title_header: '', request_by: '', request_date: hari + '/' + bulan + '/' + tahun, note: '', status: 1, created_by: userdata.username } } } toggleModal = () => { this.setState({ deleteModal: !this.state.deleteModal }) } getListEvent = async () => { let result = await API.getListItem(apiconfig.ENDPOINTS.T_EVENT) this.setState({ event: result }) } componentWillMount(data) { this.getListEvent() console.log(this.state.event) console.log(data.design) let tmp = this.state.formdata tmp.reject_reason = data.design.reject_reason this.setState({ formdata: tmp, staff: this.props.staff }) } render(){ return( Add Design Request
